title: Linux Mobile Distro postmarketOS Adopts systemd to Better Support GNOME, KDE Plasma
description:
postmarketOS Linux distribution adopts the systemd init system to offer better compatibility with the latest KDE Plasma Mobile and GNOME desktops.

The post Linux Mobile Distro postmarketOS Adopts systemd to Better Support GNOME, KDE Plasma appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GStreamer 1.24 Multimedia Framework Released with Vulkan H.264 and H.265 Video Decoders
description:
GStreamer 1.24 open-source multimedia framework is now available for download with Vulkan H.264 and H.265 video decoders, DRM Modifier Support for dmabufs on Linux, as well as many other changes.

The post GStreamer 1.24 Multimedia Framework Released with Vulkan H.264 and H.265 Video Decoders appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
